[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression(
        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: ShellExec(
                ShellExecExpression {
                    parts: [
                        Literal(
                            LiteralStringPart {
                                value: "Hello, ",
                            },
                        ),
                        Expression(
                            ExpressionStringPart {
                                expression: Variable(
                                    SimpleVariable(
                                        SimpleVariable {
                                            span: Span {
                                                line: 3,
                                                column: 2,
                                                position: 8,
                                            },
                                            name: "$name",
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                    ],
                },
            ),
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 15,
                    position: 21,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
